name: surface_radioactivity_content_of_250Cf
description: The surface called "surface" means the lower boundary of the atmosphere. "Content" indicates a quantity per unit area. "Radioactivity" means the number of radioactive decays of a material per second. "Cf" means the element "californium" and "250Cf" is the isotope "californium-250" with a half-life of 4.75e+03 days.
